items.name: Spirit Hope
enchantMods: 1 Added Passive Skill is a Jewel Socket
Added Small Passive Skills grant: 6% increased Flask Effect Duration
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +5 to Dexterity
1 Added Passive Skill is Peak Vigour
1 Added Passive Skill is Spiked Concoction
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Tempered Spirit
explicitMods: -1 Dexterity per 1 Dexterity on Allocated Passives in Radius
2% increased Movement Speed per 10 Dexterity on Allocated Passives in Radius
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: Though the body rots, the spirit lives on.
<default>{This item can be transformed on the Altar of Sacrifice along with Vial of Transcendence}

items.name: Ghoul Essence

explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +4 to All Attributes

items.descrText: Place into an allocated Small, Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Pure Talent
explicitMods:
While your Passive Skill Tree connects to a class' starting location, you gain:
Marauder: Melee Skills have 25% increased Area of Effect
Duelist: 1% of Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Ranger: 7% increased Movement Speed
Shadow: +0.5% to Critical Strike Chance
Witch: 0.5% of Mana Regenerated per second
Templar: Damage Penetrates 5% Elemental Resistances
Scion: +25 to All Attributes
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The skilled know how to learn.
The talented know who to learn from.

187.name: Spiked Concoction
stats: 5% increased Attack and Cast Speed during any Flask Effect
Gain Alchemist's Genius when you use a Flask
reminderText: (Alchemist's Genius increases Flask Charges gained by 20% and effect of Flasks by 10%, for 4 seconds)
